name: rah
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of support, used especially by cheerleaders (=a group of people who shout encouragement at a sports game) : "Goal!" "Rah, rah, rah!" I don't know how can you just stand there and say "Rah! We're gonna win!"
More examplesFewer examplesThey're all "rah, rah, rah" until they're out on the field.Rah, rah, rah. Everyone loves it!They shouted, "Rah!"They sang a song to boost morale, it was "rah, rah, rah" stuff.
